name: Captain Osciscope
description: Captain Osciscope is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES Club. With its unique traits of a cat-shaped screen and soldier-like arms and legs, Captain Osciscope combines the precision and agility of a soldier with the versatility and curiosity of a feline. This robot is ready to analyze and measure any electrical signal with utmost accuracy, making it an invaluable asset to the club and its members.
